title: my new email accounts added disapear when i shut down Thunderbird
content: I have few @Gmail accounts imported in Thunderbird. I like Thunderbird. I added another accounts (many times) and if I shut down Thunderbird, when i reopen the new accounts is disapeard, no more existing. I added again and the same situation. I found a same question on this forum from 2023 but was archived without a reply. Thanks for someoane help!
creator: mitoaca70
